code: import React,{useCallback}from'react';import'./App.css';import{Todolist}from'./components/Todolist/Todolist/Todolist';import{Box,Container,Grid,Paper,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{addTodolistAC,changeNewFilterAC,changeTodolistTitleAC,removeTodolistAC}from'./state/todolists-reducer';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AppWithReducers(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const todolists=useSelector(state=>state.todolists);const changeTodolistTitle=useCallback((todolistId,newValue)=>{dispatch(changeTodolistTitleAC(todolistId,newValue));},[]);const changeFilter=useCallback((filter,todolistId)=>{dispatch(changeNewFilterAC(todolistId,filter));},[]);const addTodolist=useCallback(title=>{dispatch(addTodolistAC(title));},[]);const removeTodolist=useCallback(id=>{dispatch(removeTodolistAC(id));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{display:'flex',justifyContent:"center",m:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h2",color:"secondary",children:" todos"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{fixed:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:4,justifyContent:'center',children:todolists.map(tl=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,mt:2.5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Todolist,{title:tl.title,changeFilter:changeFilter,filter:tl.filter,id:tl.id,removeTodolist:removeTodolist,changeTodolistTitle:changeTodolistTitle},tl.id)})});})})})]});}export default AppWithReducers;
